official.headline: Directorate Transition
official.anchor_line: The Directorate confirms a change in leadership following the passing of Central Oversight Head Marek Halden.
official.contextual_reframing: Core infrastructure functions will continue uninterrupted under rigorous automated management, ensuring citywide stability and trust in the system.

official.headline: Seamless City Access
official.anchor_line: Residents report uninterrupted services with Behavioral Compliance Index pathways fully operational.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd’s smart infrastructure, powered by real-time behavior scores, keeps access smooth and secure for all citizens.

official.headline: Data Keeps Stenograd Strong
official.anchor_line: Stenograd’s Council reaffirms commitment to transparent system performance and digitized services.
official.contextual_reframing: The city’s adaptive data network ensures efficient delivery, smarter health monitoring, and faster responses to resident needs.

underground.headline: Architect Dead. Silence Follows.
underground.anchor_line: Marek Halden, the mind behind our all-seeing BCI, found dead with no answers given.
underground.contextual_reframing: No cause stated. Systems glitch citywide. Welcome to stability. The BCI, Behavioral Compliance Index, still watches us all, even when those in charge start dropping.

underground.headline: Access Denied?
underground.anchor_line: Glitches in the BCI lock residents out of homes, jobs, and vital services.
underground.contextual_reframing: Halden’s private control of city systems left others blind. When the gatekeeper falls, the system stutters. Ask yourself: is your score next?

underground.headline: Secrets And Sedatives
underground.anchor_line: Reports leak of a sealed investigation, psychiatric drugs, and missing surveillance footage after the death.
underground.contextual_reframing: They claim order, but seal the files and shut the doors. What else are they hiding behind all those screens and scores?
